text:
Aw yeah! So today we are learning English with a 
real life conversation between Andrea and I all

about The Oscars. So by watching this lesson 
you'll be prepared to watch The Oscars and

understand everything that's happening and 
all the important vocabulary as well as any

other awards ceremony. Hi yeah. So every 
week here on learnings with TV series

we help you to understand fast speaking natives 
so that for example you can understand The Oscars

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles. Just like our fan Igor

who says that our lessons are helping him to 
improve his listening and even his pronunciation.

So join our community of over 3 million 
learners from around the world by hitting

that subscribe button and the bell below 
so that you don't miss a single new lesson.

To learn vocabulary that natives really use just 
like we're teaching you in this lesson I highly

recommend our Fluent with Friends Course. You'll 
also understand fast native speech and laugh along

with all the jokes. The best part is you can try 
it right now for free with our Three Part Master

Class. All you have to do is click up here or 
down in the description box below to sign up now!

If you're enjoying this lesson then why not 
check out this lesson we made with Meryl Streep

one of the most successful 
oscar winners of all time!

you can click up here or down in the 
description box below to watch this lesson.

So we gather together to show you 
the differences between American,

British and Australian English. Now 
although we all speak the same language

it's no surprise that there are many different 
varieties and just like in today's lesson every

week we help you to understand fascinating speech 
be understood by anyone and connect to the world.
